alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Houston; Macon; Peach (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 30 at 3:56PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Macon, Peach, central Houston and southeastern Crawford Counties through 430 PM EST... At 356 PM EST, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Marshallville, or 7 miles southwest of Fort Valley, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, pea sized hail, frequent cloud to ground lightning and increased chance of a brief tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...While winds should result in minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects, this storm has also exhibited localized rotation. A brief tornado could quickly form. Locations impacted include... Perry, Fort Valley, Warner Robins, Centerville, Byron, Marshallville, Robins Air Force Base, Saint Louis, Meadowdale, Sand Bed, Houston Lake, Lakewood, Powerville, Bonaire, Winchester, Miami Valley, Kathleen and Hicks. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EST for central and west central Georgia.
